remarks: Formula building theorem for support restrictions: vector operation with left annihilator.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Mar-2015.)  (Revised by AV, 28-May-2019.)
statement:
suppssof1.s $e |- ( ph -> ( A supp Y ) C_ L ) $.
suppssof1.o $e |- ( ( ph /\ v e. R ) -> ( Y O v ) = Z ) $.
suppssof1.a $e |- ( ph -> A : D --> V ) $.
suppssof1.b $e |- ( ph -> B : D --> R ) $.
suppssof1.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. W ) $.
suppssof1.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. U ) $.
suppssof1 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A oF O B ) supp Z ) C_ L ) $.
$d B v $.
$d O v $.
$d R v $.
$d Y v $.
$d Z v $.
$d ph v $.
